creator: dbrosius@apache.org
text: simple cleanup of unnecessary Rectangle allocation

(In reply to comment #0)
> simple cleanup of unnecessary Rectangle allocation

Could you add a bit of detail? I wasn't able to understand if this was a task, a bug report or a placeholder for a (currently missing) patch proposal. ;-)

From the subject, as a file/class wasn't specified, a find-in-files showed that this refers to "org.apache.batik.ext.awt.geom.RectListManager".

Please consider also adding a bit of background on what's going on, environment details (such as the specific Batik revision, as the "1.8" is a bit ambiguous as it doesn't yet correspond to an actual release, etc.).

Without further input I'd say it's hard (impossible?) to guess on your intention. I'm marking the issue accordingly (to call for attention). ;-)
